array.name: incorrect_feedback_txt
array.value: You use the My Links section to save your frequently used links.
The Needs Attention section lists Bullet*News articles.
The My Commitments section lists your callbacks and follow-ups.
The Recently Published section lists SOPs, non-urgent Bullet*News, and ISCS content.
The AppleLearn section lists new, pending, and overdue training.
The Emerging Issues section lists articles related to issues Engineering is tracking.
The My Handled Cases section lists cases you handled within the last 24 hours.

array.name: correct_feedback_txt
array.value: Correct! You use the My Links section to save your frequently used links. Remember, you can add and remove links and organize links using folders.
Correct! The Needs Attention section lists Bullet*News articles. Remember, you must read and acknowledge all articles before you can close Dashboard.
Correct! The My Commitments section lists your callbacks and follow-ups. Remember, alert badges indicate that commitments are overdue. You should address overdue commitments as soon as possible.
Correct! The Recently Published section lists SOPs, non-urgent Bullet*News, and ISCS content. Remember, you can remove content you've already reviewed.
Correct! The AppleLearn section lists new, pending, and overdue training. Remember, you can access your training using the My Learning menu in the Advisor's Corner.
Correct! The Emerging Issues section lists articles related to issues Engineering is tracking. Remember, you can keep articles open in Article Viewer throughout your day for quick reference.
Correct! The My Handled Cases section lists cases you handled within the last 24 hours. Remember, you can click the star to add up to 200 cases to the My Handled Cases section.

layer.name: layer_question
layer.html:
Scenario 1 of 7

You frequently refer customers to apple.com/batteries so they can learn more about managing their devicesâ€™ battery life. Where can you add this link so you can quickly open it later in Safari?
